item.title: Trailing Zeros
item.description: Number of 5s + number of 5x5s + number of 5x5x5… 1 class Solution: 2 # @param n a integer 3 # @return ans a integer 4 def trailingZeros(self, n): 5 ret = 0 6 div = 5 7 r = n/div 8 9 while r > 0: 10 r = n/div 11 div *= 5 12 ret += r 13 14 return ret
